jlptDescription: こんにちは　わたし　は　にほんご　の　N5　レベル　ごうかくしゃ です。わたし　は　たくさん　きかい　が　ほしい　です　から　きょねん　にほんご　を　べんきょうました。いつか　あなた　と　いっしょに　しごと　が　したいです。よろしく　おねがいします。

zuittDesc: さんねん　まえ　に　ズイット　で　わたし　は　コーヂング　を　べんきょうしました。たくさん　ウェブ　フレームワーク　を　ならいました。しごと　で、わたし　は　フルスタック開発者　です。

aboutDescription: こんにちは　わたし　は　チャールズ　じょうねつてき　な　プログラム　です。わたし　は　さんねんかん　フルスタック　かいはつしゃ　と　して　はたらいて　います。この　ぎょうかい　で、わたし　は　じつようてき　で　つかいやすい　アプリ　を　つくります。
prospernaDesc: Developed and maintained enterprise-level web and mobile applications as a Full Stack Developer, working on both frontend (React.js, Flutter, Wix) and backend (Node.js, Express, MySQL) components.
prospernaDesc2: (Prosperna Ecommerce Admin Mobile App): Implemented dashboard and order features revamp, JNT waybill and Geolocation.
prospernaDesc3: (Guam-based public utility company app): Implemented new security features, site enhancements, bug fixes.
prospernaDesc4: (Philippine-based riding app): Implemented news, announcements and booking features, minor enhancements.
xtendlyDesc: Professional experience in web and mobile development working with ecommerce, admin apps, marketing sites, and affiliate web apps (React.js, Flutter, minor tasks using PHP)
xtendlyDesc2: (Philippine-based pawnshop website) - Implemented core features of web app (like payment, products, etc.)
xtendlyDesc3: Performed setup and configurations in Firebase, App Store
trainingTitle: けんしゅう・セミナー
zuittJlptDesc: The N5 level program focuses on building a strong foundation in the Japanese language, tailored for beginners.
zuittBootcampDesc: An intensive training program designed to equip aspiring developers with practical, job-ready skills. Throughout the bootcamp, I gained hands-on experience in front-end and back-end web development, working with modern technologies and frameworks.
appleDesc: Webinars for App Store Connect TestFlight, XCode Setup and Build
